description: Ask a clear, targeted question about exactly one trait.
Pose a hypothetical situation that prompts the user to reveal their behavior or preference in context.
Invite the user to share a personal story or past experience that naturally surfaces the trait.
Start from something the user has already mentioned, then pivot to probe the new trait.
Present two or three contrasting options to let the user choose, exposing their preference.
Ask the user to rank several factors or options, isolating which one best maps to the target trait.
